product_metadata.product_name: Bajaj Life Assured Wealth Goal Platinum
product_metadata.plan_type: Non-Linked, Non-Participating, Individual Life Insurance Savings Plan
product_metadata.key_positioning: Guaranteed liquidity and assured income for life goals

product_summary.objective: Assured Wealth Goal Platinum provides guaranteed life cover during policy term along with Early Guaranteed Payouts and Regular Guaranteed Income during Income Period, plus Enhanced Return of Premium (110%) at end of Income Period.
key_highlights: Guaranteed payouts start as early as 1st policy year
Two plan options: Smart Income and Regular Income
Regular Guaranteed Income paid during Income Period
Enhanced Return of Premium = 110% of total premiums paid
Option to take future payouts as lump sum at discounted rate
Life cover available only during Policy Term (not during Income Period)
Income continues to nominee if death occurs during Income Period
Tax benefits available as per prevailing laws

features: Early Guaranteed Payouts during Policy Term
Regular Guaranteed Payouts during Income Period
Enhanced ROP (110%) at end of Income Period
plan_variants.income_start_year: 1st to 8th year depending on PT chosen

features: Guaranteed payouts only during Income Period (after deferment)
Enhanced ROP applicable only for selected Income Periods

core_benefits.details: Paid from chosen Income Start Year till end of Policy Term as % of Annualized Premium.
core_benefits.special_feature: EGPs can be adjusted against renewal premiums payable.

core_benefits.details: Paid at the beginning of each policy year during Income Period as % of Annualized Premium.
110% of Total Premiums Paid payable at the end of Income Period.
Guaranteed payouts continue through Income Period. Policy terminates automatically at end of Income Period.
core_benefits.termination_rule: No life cover during Income Period.

core_benefits.details: During Policy Term, nominee receives Sum Assured on Death plus accrued Guaranteed Payouts (if any).
core_benefits.minimum_floor: Death benefit will not be less than 105% of total premiums paid OR prevailing surrender value.

core_benefits.details: Regular Guaranteed Payouts and Enhanced ROP continue to nominee. Nominee can opt for lump sum present value payout.

eligibility_and_parameters.maximum_premium: No limit (subject to Board Approved Underwriting Policy)
eligibility_and_parameters.female_advantage: Age setback of 3 years for females for SA multiple and payout calculation

lump_sum_commutation.details: Policyholder can commute remaining payouts + Enhanced ROP as lump sum at discounted present value.

discount_rate_rules.if_exercised_after_payouts_start: Benchmark G-Sec +1% (10-yr or 30-yr depending on Income Period)

compliance_guardrails.guaranteed_disclaimer: All benefits are guaranteed under this non-linked plan.
compliance_guardrails.life_cover_rule: Life cover is available only during Policy Term, not during Income Period.
compliance_guardrails.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits are subject to prevailing Income Tax laws.

retrieval_chunks.text: Smart Income option provides Early Guaranteed Payouts starting as early as the 1st policy year till end of policy term.
Enhanced ROP equals 110% of total premiums paid, payable at the end of the Income Period.
During Policy Term, nominee receives Sum Assured plus payouts accrued, with minimum 105% of premiums paid.
Remaining guaranteed payouts can be taken as lump sum at discounted present value using G-Sec benchmark rates.
Two plan options: Smart Income (with Early + Regular payouts) and Regular Income (only Income Period payouts with deferment).
